scripts.offline: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production WEBPACK_MODE=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls offline start
scripts.deploy: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production WEBPACK_MODE=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls deploy -v
scripts.deploy:qa: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production WEBPACK_MODE=production NODE_ENV=qa SLS_DEBUG=* sls deploy --stage qa -v
scripts.deploy:stage: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production WEBPACK_MODE=production NODE_ENV=stage SLS_DEBUG=* sls deploy --stage stage -v
scripts.deploy:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production WEBPACK_MODE=production NODE_ENV=production SLS_DEBUG=* sls deploy --stage prod -v
